chat.web.bean

Class InvitationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.web.bean.InvitationManager

  • @Named(value="invitationManager")
 @ApplicationScoped
public class InvitationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The InvitationManager holds the invitation list for each chat room and verifies user invitations to the rooms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InvitationManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInvitationList(java.lang.String roomName, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> invitations)
      This method adds the given list of invitations to the map with the chat room name as the key.
      void init()
      This method constructs the map for invitation lists.
      void removeInvitationList(java.lang.String roomName)
      This method remove the list of invitations mapped by the given room name.
      int reportInvitationListsSize()
      This method returns the size of the invitation lists map.
      boolean verifyInvitation(java.lang.String roomName, java.lang.String username)
      This method determines if the user with the given username is invited to the given room.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

public void init()
        This method constructs the map for invitation lists.

      • addInvitationList

        public void addInvitationList(java.lang.String roomName,
                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> invitations)
        This method adds the given list of invitations to the map with the chat room name as the key.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the chat room name
        invitations - the list of invitations

      • removeInvitationList

        public void removeInvitationList(java.lang.String roomName)
        This method remove the list of invitations mapped by the given room name.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the chat room name

      • verifyInvitation

        public boolean verifyInvitation(java.lang.String roomName,
                                java.lang.String username)
        This method determines if the user with the given username is invited to the given room.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the chat room name
        username - the username of the user
        Returns:
        the boolean indicating whether or not the user is invited to the room

      • reportInvitationListsSize

        public int reportInvitationListsSize()
        This method returns the size of the invitation lists map.
        Returns:
        the size of the invitation lists map
